TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AutomationFocusChangedEventHandler(object sender, AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AutomationFocusChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AutomationFocusChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs)
public delegate void AutomationFocusChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs ^ e);
type AutomationFocusChangedEventHandler = delegate of obj * AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: El objeto que ha generado el evento.

span.span: The object that raised the event.

summary.span: Representa el método implementado por la aplicación cliente de Automatización de la interfaz de usuario para controlar el evento provocado por un proveedor de Automatización de la interfaz de usuario cuando ha cambiado el foco.

span.span: Represents the method implemented by the UI Automation client application to handle the event raised by a UI Automation provider when the focus has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use un delegado para definir el método que llama a un cliente para controlar [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] eventos de cambio de foco.Use an delegate to define the method that is called by a client to handle [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] focus-changed events. El representado por `sender` podrían no haya ninguno en memoria caché propiedades o patrones, en función de si la aplicación se suscribió a este evento mientras un estaba activa.The represented by `sender` might not have any cached properties or patterns, depending on whether the application subscribed to this event while a was active. ## Examples El ejemplo siguiente implementa un delegado para controlar los eventos de cambio de foco.The following example implements a delegate to handle focus-changed events. [!code-csharp[UIAFocusTracker_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFocusTracker_snip/CSharp/FocusTracker.cs#106)] [!code-vb[UIAFocusTracker_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFocusTracker_snip/VisualBasic/FocusTracker.vb#106)]

related.span: Suscribirse a eventos de UI Automation
